summary:
This mod adds cat (actually khajiit) ears headband and fake cat tail to the game.

The headbands work like circlets. The cat disguise only work for human characters. Gold ruby circlet will be shown instead when equipted by Khajiit/Argonian and the fake tail disappeared (with only real khajiit/argonian tail displayed.)

descriptionHtml:
I\'m not an English speaker, sorry for poor English.

<<Description>>

This mod adds cat (actually khajiit) ears headband and fake cat tail to the game.

The headbands work like circlets. The cat disguise only work for human characters. Gold ruby circlet will be shown instead when equipted by Khajiit/Argonian and the fake tail disappeared (with only real khajiit/argonian tail displayed.)

The cat tail (act as necklace/amulet) is not a real tail with proper tail animations, it\'s just a fake one with simulated bone weight to move as you move, and may look strange doing some actions/poses.

This is a stand along mod. It doesn\'t replace anything.


Cat Ears Band: cloth armor circlet
Item FormID:0x001003
to craft: Blacksmith forges, craft category:Jewelry, with 1 leather stripe
to improve: not applicable (AR=0 cloth armor)
to Enchant: Work like ordinary circlets/helms


Cat Ears Band Light: light armor circlet. craft category:Leather, with same AR as Dragon Scale Helm.
Item FormID:0x001004
to craft: Blacksmith forges, category:Leather, with 1 leather
to improve: Worktables, with 1 leather
to Enchant: Work like ordinary circlets/helms


Cat Ears Band Heavy: Heavy armor circlet, craft category:Iron, with same AR as Daedric Helm.
Item FormID:0x001005
to craft: Blacksmith forges, category:Iron, with 1 iron ingot
to improve: Worktables, with 1 iron ingot
to Enchant: Work like ordinary circlets/helms

Cat Tail Amulet: necklace/amulet
Item FormID:0x001006
to craft: Blacksmith forges, craft category:Jewelry, with 1 leather
to improve: not applicable (necklace/amulet)
to Enchant: Work like ordinary necklaces/amulet

<<Update Log>>
R1: Jan. 17, 2012
 Additionally support male characters now.
 Improved global object collision models and phisics.

<<Requirements>>

None, i guess.

<<To Install/Update>>

Copy/Overwrite files to game folders accordingly.

Kaw\'s Cat Disguise.esp:
Skyrim\\Data\\

meshes:
Skyrim\\data\\meshes\\cat disguise\\

textures: none (use vanilla/compatible khajiit head/body textures)

*Remember to activiate Kaw\'s Cat Disguise.esp on your game manager/launcher to make it take effect.

<<To un-install>>

Delete related files.

<<know bugs/glitches>>


<<Credits and Thanks>>

(C)Bethesda

and all mod tools developers, tutorial writers, talented modders. Without your efforts I can do nothing.

<<for mod resources>>

Free to use my works (not including those works credit to others of course) as open resources of your mod. No further permission needed. I granted permission here. That\'s my way to say thanks and show my respect to all mod tools developers, tutorial writers, talented modders.

I\'ll be happy if you credit me or just let me know. (Okay if not, not a must)
author: kaw
